thread.section_title: Renaissance Beijing Capital Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best service and kind staff
thread.title_full: Best service and kind staff - Review of Renaissance Beijing Capital Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Pat c
title: Best service and kind staff
text: Not only is this hotel sparkling clean, but the staff will go out of their way to help you! Our daughter left her phone in a cab that dropped us off, 10 min later we tracked it, our concierge; Garret Li without hesitation, called the person who found our phone and took us out to meet them at a near by subway! The person that found the phone and Garrett himself, would not even accept a cash reward to show our gratitude! This is a true reflection of the honor that the Chinese have and for which they display to their guests in their country! Thank you Garrett and the Marriott staff for a fantastic stay!
